title: 8000contestdrmoned 1
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:advanced-information-methodology blocks=-

]]

[[div class="box imagebox"]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block

caption= The location of SCP-8125's first noticed reality alteration. |
align=center |
width=100%
]]
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:advanced-information-methodology blocks=!
|site=Site-12
|dir=Dr Durrani
|head=Dr Michaels
|mtf=STF Rho-7 (“Greeting Party”)
|cc-link=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/fragment:8000contestdrmoned-1/cc_GLEIPNIR.png
]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[=]]
++++ **__Special Containment Procedures__**[[footnote]]Gleipnir: Item continuously requires different/new forms of containment, thereby precluding standard classification.[[/footnote]]
[[/=]]
----

Security cameras are to be installed at all known Wanderer's Library Way locations. Any reported anomalous phenomena in these locations are to be immediately contained by a suitable perimeter and investigated for signs of SCP-8125 manifestation. All non-living phenomena are to have a preliminary research report completed, noting any anomalous effects, before exploration is allowed to proceed. Any entities captured are to be transported to the nearby site immediately for questioning and termination if deemed necessary.

Any Wanderer's Library Ways near civilian hubs are to be pre-emptively cordoned off utilising cover stories such as delayed construction or funding cuts. Cooperation with Serpent's Hand members in this area is to be made use of for efficient reaction to any anomalous phenomena that may breach the veil. Due to the ongoing agreement between the Serpent's Hand and the Foundation, any sufficiently near-baseline humanoid is to be relinquished to the Serpent's Hand.

Research into potential thaumaturgical methods of blocking SCP-8125 manifestations is also ongoing with a joint Foundation and Serpent's Hand task force.

Due to the difference in anomalous phenomena created by SCP-8125, no definitive containment procedures for anomalies can be provided. MTF units are encouraged to suggest potential containment methods and to work with nearby departments specialised in the related subject matter to create suitable methods of containment.

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/RAISA_LIGHTLOGO.png) center no-repeat; float: center; background-size: 50%; background-color: #f2f2c2;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION
----
Numerous departments are working in conjunction with the SCP-8125 research team under Dr Michaels to try and figure out the rules of SCP-8125 manifestations, its creation circumstances, and a reason for the initial deviation from Nx-23 default behaviour. Any new information pertaining to SCP-8125 instances, manifestation similarities, or Nx-23 information is to be sent immediately to Dr Michaels and/or RAISA staff for investigation and categorization.

— Jane Berry, Senior Clerk, RAISA
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]


[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; padding:5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[=]]
++++ **__Description__**
[[/=]]
----

SCP-8125 is the collective designation for anomalous phenomena resulting from pieces of Nx-23 manifesting in baseline reality. Though the first recorded SCP-8125 manifestation was in 2007, Nx-23 was initially discovered and contained in 1996. It is unknown how many SCP-8125 manifestations, if any, occurred during this earlier period.

SCP-8125 instances share no discernable connecting traits, with distinct phenomena and rules applying to each manifestation documented. The majority of SCP-8125 events lead to stationary, non-living anomalies that can be contained in situ, though several entities have been recovered within these initial phenomena. Questioning of these recovered entities has led to no information on SCP-8125 or Nx-23, with all answers adhering strictly to the narrative that they were a part of. Inquiry into any subject unrelated to the entity's narrative causes confusion and a reported "fuzzy headache."

Whilst cooperation with Serpent's Hand operatives has helped discover and contain numerous Ways into Nx-23, it is believed that many additional Ways are still unknown or contained as unrelated anomalies. A combined task force of RAISA and the history department are currently investigating any SCPs with unclear origins.
[[/div]]


[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; padding:5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[=]]
++++ **__Addendum 1: Incident-8125-A__**
[[/=]]
----
The attached research notes were found in a folder after the disappearance of SCP-8125's lead researcher, Dr Michaels. An additional blank page with "Nx-23's Creation" was also within the folder.

Dr Michaels was captured on CCTV running out of the Sector 2 toilets, towards the sector elevator and stairway, at 9:22pm on the 18th of May, 2008; though the footage cuts off shortly after. It is unknown at exactly what time Dr Michaels disappeared from the Central-Southern Facility, though he was noted missing the next morning by Chronology Division staff. No footage showing Dr Michaels leaving Site-12 could be found.

An investigation into the Central-Southern facility's electrical system showed a fault in Sector 3, in a janitorial area of the site. The fault was discovered to be a large humanoid wolf creature fused to both the wall and circuit box, with three small pigs lying dead in an electrified pool of water, likely manifested by an SCP-8125 event.


[[size 110%]]
[[div class="document" style="margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
[[div class="architects-daughter-regular"]]
We're fairly sure something must have happened recently that made this phenomenon worse, to cause the regular reality imprinting. I'm 90% certain that we've sporadically had escapees from Nx-23 for a long while, but that's hard to prove without wasting necessary resources.

What we can say is SCP-8125 is relatively new, starting in the last 10 years or so. We're 99% sure on that. Areas near Library Ways have always been different, but rarely ever highly anomalous like this.

Also, it's not the Library itself doing this, or at least, as far as the Serpent's Hand tells us. Luckily, they have no reason to lie, it's screwed with their operations as much, if not more, than ours. It's like stepping outside your door and there's a chance a mine has appeared.

There are more talks ongoing with the Hand too. They're trying out some new thumaturgy for suppressing the Ways. It seems like clever stuff, went right over my head, so I'll keep my fingers crossed. After they started saying "seventeenth time's the charm" my confidence in them did diminish slightly though.

Not that we're any closer to understanding the rules (if there are any) of SCP-8125 either. Max hypothesised that somehow things appearing outside of Nx-23 become more real, becoming part of our reality almost instantaneously. But the samples taken from inside Nx-23 suggest it was always real. No, I think it's about stability, they become more solid, perhaps. Confined to a singular idea. Unlike their state of flux within the Nexus. Though not sure how it relates to them getting through the rituals. Perhaps they're just being forced through a narrow crack with such pressure that any barrier in the way is broken.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/size]]

[[size 110%]]
[[div class="document" style="margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
[[div class="architects-daughter-regular"]]
I'm wondering if every SCP-8125 manifestation has a related entity...

What am I writing, of course it does, the Prime entity. Could the entity be bringing the narrative with them when they leave Nx-23 and

No no, that wouldn't work. Why would the rules of the //nexus// and prime beings affect out here, besides, we'd have noticed repeated prime entities appearing repeatedly.

Bringing a narrative out seems plausible, somehow being out here gives it the ability to manifest... but what would that narrative manifest as?

And all of that doesn't explain why SCP-8125 only got worse recently! Nx-23 was fine for ages. And there doesn't seem to be a change from the inside, from what the remaining internal cameras show. Though it's hard to tell given the constant shifting and dream logic in there. I'd check myself but the risk is too high.

Damn, I feel like I'm missing a large piece of the puzzle.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/size]]

[[size 110%]]
[[div class="document" style="margin-bottom: 0px;"]]
[[div class="architects-daughter-regular"]]
What if something has changed with Nx-23, it just wasn't perceptible.

We don't actually know what caused its existence. Maybe that's the missing link. Maybe something messed with that, causing a knock-on effect. The big problem there is that I'm no timeline expert. If it's the health of the timeline that's causing these issues, I'm stumped, especially when I lack this much info/context. Normally I'd be able to somewhat piece stuff together. I guess I could try contacting Vane but he went off to the US to help Xyank with a project.

I'll need to request the original documentation again. Perhaps I'll look through nearby anomaly and site records, to see if anything happened that could've caused it to manifest or become damaged.

It did initially spread Ways across the globe rather rapidly... as if it was copying something. Perhaps it had a memory of something that it was using, or was it replicating something that existed already? Though once again that happened at the beginning of Nx-23, why would it cause issues now...

I mean hell all the SCP-8125 instances and Nx-23 Ways we know of have been near Wanderer's Library Ways. I know the Serpent's Hand hasn't seen anything but maybe something deep in the library is happening. Seems like an awfully large coincidence otherwise.
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/size]]

[[div_ style="margin-top= -8px;"]]
Following the electrical fault, a damage report was compiled showing the impact from both the power outage and the resulting power surge. This report showed large structural damage to the nearby Acroamatic Abatement plant and Southern Facility power plant, necessitating significant rebuilding efforts. Also suggested was the construction of a containment cell for the Nx-23 Way located in the Central-Southern facility, mitigating the effects of any future SCP-8125 events.
[[/div]]

The report shows that scientific advancements made since the Abatement facility's construction in 1996 allow for safer, more efficient waste management technology to be utilised in the retrofit. Due to time constraints and the risk of an SCP-8125 event nearby, it is suggested that much of the logistical side of the facility remains unchanged.

During the dredging of the primary clarifier to prepare for the retrofit, a semi-decomposed, damaged and extremely bloated human corpse was discovered, identified as the body of Dr Michaels. It is believed that Dr Michaels was crossing a catwalk when the nearby sedimentation tank burst (likely due to the monitoring equipment's loss of power) with the resulting debris knocking him into the grit chamber below. It is still unknown why Dr Michaels was in the Abatement Facility during this time.
[[/div]]

[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; padding:5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[=]]
++++ **__Addendum 2: SCP-8125 frequency__**
[[/=]]
----

A year after Dr Michaels' disappearance, the SCP-8125 research team noted a sharp increase in SCP-8125 events globally. Though the rate of SCP-8125 manifestations seems to have plateaued, with at least one manifestation per month, this is vastly higher than the sub-yearly rate recorded prior. It is unknown if the loss of Dr Michaels is related to this phenomenon.

For the purpose of investigation into causes, links, or containment stratagems, a compilation of SCP-8125 manifestations since 2007 has been compiled below. Any additions to this document are to be authorized by RAISA personnel.

[[collapsible show="◉ Known SCP-8125 Phenomena Documentation ◉" hide="◎ Known SCP-8125 Phenomena Documentation ◎"]]

----

[[table style="margin: 0 10px 0 0;"]]
[[row]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid silver; background-color: #96182B;"]]
Phenomena ID
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Phenomena Location and Discovery Date
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Phenomena Containment Progress
[[/hcell]]
[[hcell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Phenomena Description
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:3px; border: 0px solid silver" colspan="4"]]

[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; margin-top: -20px; padding:0.5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
#8125-07-001
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
21st of June, 2007. France
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
The creature's body has been disposed of and all remaining rock has been excavated, containment in the guise of an open-air quarry has been achieved.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Terrain around the manifestation had turned to dry, dusty orange rock. A large lobster-like creature with twenty one leg-like appendages was found dead in a deep chasm at the centre of the manifestation. During incinerator of the corpse, an emerald gem the size of two fists was discovered. Experimentation with this gem is ongoing.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
#8125-08-002
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
2nd of Feburary, 2008. India
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Following the collection of samples from numerous unknown species, the mire has been drained. A research station has been erected and researchers are to warn away civilians under the guise of chemical testing.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
The manifestation replaced the ground with sticky bleached mud, which is extremely deep in some parts. A wooden vessel sits at the centre of the mud, on somewhat solid ground, though appears to have split in two after hitting the mud with force. A large rock was discovered in the centre of the vessel, noted to have levitational properties. This rock has been transported to Site-36 for testing.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:12px; border: 0px dashed silver; border-width: 0px 2px" colspan="4"]]
[[div_ style="text-align: center;"]]
... //5 additional entries hidden.// ...
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
#8125-09-0008
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
15th of August, 2009. Wales
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Following the removal of all corpses, this location is to be monitored but no longer contained
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Insignificant anomalous changes to the area surrounding the manifestation were noticed, though lack of documentation of this area made comparison difficult. Researchers did note an unusual grove of oak trees within the manifestation area. Numerous corpses were discovered near these trees, as if mid-battle. One set of corpses was human, wearing simplistic metal armour, and appeared to be fleeing towards the south. The other entities were also humanoid, but made entirely from wood. These wooden soldiers surrounded the human bodies on three sides, excluding the north.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:12px; border: 0px dashed silver; border-width: 0px 2px" colspan="4"]]
[[div_ style="text-align: center;"]]
... //2 additional entries hidden.// ...
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
#8125-09-0011
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
29th of November, 2009. USA
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Due to the SCP-8125 manifestation being within a large town, a construction site has been created. Following the complete dismantling of the exterior, the interior is to be expanded into a nightclub. The exposed rock is to be covered over with the new building and a parking lot out back.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
The diner appears to have been cut in half by the manifestation, the phrase "liways" can be found on a large neon sign at the front of the building. The building itself was believed to be starfish-shaped, though only two of the legs have manifested; one leg contains a bar area resembling a cyberpunk rendition of an 80's diner, whilst the other contains half of a large metal machine, though is cut off by the manifestation area. In the centre sits a large golden dome, with seating within. The ground beneath the building has been converted into towers of flat rocks, devoid of any plant life.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:12px; border: 0px dashed silver; border-width: 0px 2px" colspan="4"]]
[[div_ style="text-align: center;"]]
... //8 additional entries hidden.// ...
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
#8125-10-0020
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
29th of September, 2010. New Zealand
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
Due to the size of the manifestation all fishermen who discovered this SCP-8125 manifestation have been given amnestics and a perception inhibiting thaumaturgy is being utilised to prevent discovery. Whilst several entities escaped Foundation capture, the majority have been contained within the facility following the anomalous sleeping gas being pumped in through boreholes in the volcano's surface. Full containment is expected soon.
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid silver"]]
The SCP-8125 manifestation appears to be an entire island, comprised of a ring of jungle surrounding a large volcano. Within the volcano is a large, high-tech community consisting of living spaces, training areas, classrooms, bio labs, and numerous offices. Due to the established infrastructure and lack of knowledge outside the Foundation, this facility is under review for MTF training.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="padding:12px; border: 0px dashed silver; border-style: none dashed solid; border-width: 0px 2px 1px" colspan="4"]]
[[div_ style="text-align: center;"]]
... //5 additional entries hidden.// ...
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]

[[/table]]
[[/collapsible]]


Due to the potential of a broken veil situation arising from SCP-8125 manifestations in urban areas, pre-emptive containment is to be set up in any sufficiently populated locations[[footnote]]See the SCP-8125 research team for clarification[[/footnote]]. Locations near Foundation facilities with a Nx-23 Way are to be patrolled at all times by facility guards, with the remaining Nx-23 Ways having security cameras installed nearby and constant remote surveillance.

Select sites are to undergo generalised IAIC[[footnote]]Initial Anomaly Interaction and Containment[[/footnote]] training for in-house MTF members, allowing for their usage in STF Rho-7[[footnote]]STF teams are Special Task Forces formed from members of other MTF teams, and potentially researchers, to perform a certain rapid response task. Rho-7 is an STF tasked with the preliminary evaluation of an anomaly, allowing for quick, partial containment, and the informed delegation of an appropriate MTF unit.[[/footnote]] to explore, document and contain SCP-8125 phenomena.

With express O5 support, weekly unmanned expeditions into Nx-23 have resumed. These expeditions are to check for abnormalities within the extradimensional space, rather than to explore Nx-23 itself.

[[/div]]

[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; padding:5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[=]]
++++ **__Addendum 3: Incident-8125-B__**
[[/=]]
----

On the 7th of June, 2011, STF Rho-9 ("Greeting Party) were investigating reports of a SCP-8125 manifestation in the Peak District National Park. Initially, only a large forested area and a man in robes with a hat reading "Wizzard" were contained.[[footnote]]The man having run out of the forest towards STF Rho-9 screaming about a mushroom with windows[[/footnote]] After in-situ containment of the entity, three members of Rho-9 entered the forest, quickly discovering a phone and Foundation notebook belonging to the late Dr Michaels. Both items were recovered on a tree stump near the southern edge of the SCP-8125 manifestation; no other items relating to Dr Michaels were found.
[[/div]]

[[div style="border:solid 0px #444444; padding:5px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/RAISA_LIGHTLOGO.png) center no-repeat; float: center; background-size: 50%; background-color: #f2f2c2;"]]
[[=]]
++++ NOTICE FROM THE FOUNDATION RECORDS AND INFORMATION SECURITY ADMINISTRATION
----
The findings and theories present in the recovered log and photos substantially alter the current perception of SCP-8125, requiring new containment procedures and significantly altered documentation to be produced.

For any non-archival staff, please see [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-8125/offset/2 the updated file linked here].

— Jane Berry, Senior Clerk, RAISA
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: Dr Moned
